txt.en: The Challenge Field is located just east of Brockenborings.\n\nTo participate in the Bullroarer's Challenge, Tobias Brockhouse told you to stand on the starting platform, pick up your official Bullroarer's Challenge brew tankard, toast to Bandobras's health, and make it across the north fence to the other platform, where Belgo is standing, before time runs out.
Do not fall off the fence
Sigismond North-took is in Brockenborings.\n\nSpeak with Sigismond North-took to claim your prize.
'You did it! I never doubted you for a moment, [placeholder]! You have truly honoured the spirit of Bandobras Took.'
You have failed the Bullroarer's Challenge

Sigismond North-took has invited you to participate in the Bullroarer's Challenge in Brockenborings.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000> NOTE: This quest will be removed from your quest log when the current festival ends. </rgb>
You have won the Bullroarer's Challenge
You must take the north path

'Sigismond North-took sent you to participate in the Bullroarer's Challenge, did he?

'The game's origin dates back to Bandobras Took himself. Every morning, it is said, he would run atop the fences of the Great Smials to stay in shape and hone his reflexes.

'Simply stand on the starting platform, pick up your official Bullroarer's Challenge brew tankard, toast to Bandobras's health, and make it across the fence to the other platform, where Belgo is standing, before time runs out. 

'The path you'll want to run on is the sections of fence to the north of us. Good luck, [placeholder]!'
You must take the north path
